name: Complete Project Proposal
description: Draft and finalize project proposal document.

name: Design User Interface
description: Create wireframes and mockups for the user interface.

name: Develop Backend API
description: Implement RESTful APIs for backend functionality.

name: Write Unit Tests
description: Create unit tests to ensure code quality.

name: Review Codebase
description: Conduct peer code reviews for quality assurance.

name: Prepare Presentation
description: Prepare slides for project presentation.

name: Update Documentation
description: Update project documentation with latest changes.

name: Fix Bug in Login Module
description: Investigate and fix bug reported in the login module.

name: Deploy Application
description: Deploy application to production servers.

name: Client Meeting
description: Schedule and conduct meeting with client to gather requirements.

name: Optimize Database Queries
description: Identify and optimize slow database queries.

name: Create Test Data
description: Generate test data for automated testing.

name: Refactor Codebase
description: Refactor existing code for better maintainability.

name: Prepare Sprint Review
description: Prepare presentation and demo for sprint review meeting.

name: Document API Endpoints
description: Document all API endpoints for developer reference.

name: Implement New Feature
description: Add new feature requested by the client.

name: Run System Tests
description: Execute system tests to validate overall system functionality.

name: Review User Feedback
description: Analyze user feedback and prioritize enhancements.

name: Update Security Policies
description: Update security policies to address new vulnerabilities.

name: Create User Guides
description: Create user guides for end-users.

name: Perform Code Review
description: Review code submitted by team members.
